bxe2\x80\xa2 Names must be formed from alphanumeric characters.\x02\x10\x01\x03\xe2\x80\xa2 The following punctuation marks are also allowed:\x02\x10\x01\x03\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff\x80\x80\x03'\x02\x1d\x01\x03.
column4: : ; ! ? & - _\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03\x02\x10\x01\x03\xe2\x80\xa2 Double spaces are not allowed.\x02\x10\x01\x03\xe2\x80\xa2 A space cannot be used before or after the name.\x02\x10\x01\x03\xe2\x80\xa2 Names consisting solely of punctuation marks are prohibited."

column3: Are you certain you wish to dismantle \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03\x02)\x03\xea\x02\x03\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03?\x02\x10\x01\x03\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff\x80\x80\x03Please note that while airship components will be returned, your airship's registration, rank, and accrued experience will be lost.\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
To outfit and register an airship, you must have in your possession the requisite components and flight credits.
\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Flight credits\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03 can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Airship components\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03 can be constructed in your company workshop. Please note that hull, rigging, forecastle, and aftcastle components are required to outfit an airship.
You cannot deploy your airship on exploratory voyages without ceruleum tanks, which can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.
Upon the completion of an exploratory voyage, your mammet will provide a \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03voyage log\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03 detailing the results.
The information contained in this log may prove useful in preparing for your next exploratory voyage.
Please note that only the log for the previous voyage will be retained.
You cannot repair airship components without the requisite materials.
